contents.text: Welcome to Sourceress, the San Francisco-based AI recruiter reinventing talent acquisition for businesses.
To speak with our sales team about AI recruiting software demos and pricing, press '1'.
For pricing details and to schedule a product demo, press '1'.
Thank you for your interest in pricing and demos. Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist.

navigationGoals: I need a demo of your AI recruiting platform and a breakdown of your subscription tiers.
I’d like pricing info and to schedule a demo of your AI recruiting tool for my veteran-led hiring team.
Schedule a live demo of your AI recruiting engine and get detailed pricing tiers
I’d like to schedule a demo of your recruiting software and learn about the pricing.
I want to get pricing details and schedule a demo of your AI recruiting software for my physics research group.

contents.text: For partnership opportunities and software integrations, press '2'.
Connecting you to our partnerships team. Please hold.

navigationGoals: I’m looking to integrate Sourceress into our HR system and explore a partnership opportunity.
I want to discuss integrating Sourceress with our veteran employment portal as a partnership opportunity.
Discuss API integration compatibility and partnership terms with Sourceress
I need details on partnering with you and integrating your AI recruiter into our system.
I’m exploring a partnership to integrate Sourceress into my university’s career services.

contents.text: For customer support or assistance with your existing Sourceress account, press '2'.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press '1'.
Thank you for contacting technical support. Please hold for the next available agent.

navigationGoals: My dashboard isn’t loading candidate profiles—I need technical assistance.
I’m having trouble accessing my Sourceress account dashboard and need technical support.
Troubleshoot OAuth token errors in my Sourceress API integration
I’m having trouble accessing my Sourceress account and need technical help.
I need technical help troubleshooting an error in my Sourceress account dashboard.

contents.text: For billing inquiries and account management, press '2'.
Your call is important to us. Please hold while we connect you to billing support.

navigationGoals: I’d like to update my payment method and review my recent invoice details.
I need to review my latest invoice and update our billing details on my account.
Clarify my SaaS billing cycle, invoice line items, and update my payment method
I have a question about my recent bill and need assistance managing my account.
I’d like to update my payment method and review recent charges on our Sourceress account.
